examples.example: 人生总有那么一回遇到困难，但只要坚持就能迎来美好。

translate.english: There is always such a time in life when encountering difficulties, but as long as one persists, one can welcome the beauty.

examples.example: 每一回努力过后，都会收获满满的成就感。

translate.english: After every effort, there will be a full sense of achievement.

examples.example: 每一回帮助他人，都能让我感受到发自内心的快乐。

translate.english: Every time I help others, it can make me feel the happiness from the bottom of my heart.
